sentences.en: Cut the lobster shells into small pieces with heavy-duty scissors.
sentences.cn: 用粗剪将龙虾壳剪成小片。

sentences.en: Four officers were told to go off duty and rest at home.
sentences.cn: 四名官员已经被通知停职在家休整。

sentences.en: He had a third examination and was declared unfit for duty.
sentences.cn: 他接受了第三次检查，被告知不宜上班。

sentences.en: He took up office out of a sense of duty.
sentences.cn: 他就任公职是出于一种责任感。

sentences.en: His duty was to conciliate the people, not to provoke them.
sentences.cn: 他的职责是安抚那些人，而不是去激怒他们。

sentences.en: I consider it my duty to write to you and thank you.
sentences.cn: 我认为写信向你表达谢意是我的责任。

sentences.en: I don'tsee it as my duty to take sides.
sentences.cn: 我认为我没必要非得向着一方。

sentences.en: I promise I will do my duty .
sentences.cn: 我保证会尽到我的责任。

sentences.en: In the traditional Hindu family, the son is duty-bound to look after his mother.
sentences.cn: 在传统的印度家庭里，儿子负有照顾母亲的责任。

sentences.en: Local authorities have a duty to keep the streets clean.
sentences.cn: 地方当局有责任保持街道整洁。

sentences.en: Martin’s duties included cleaning the cars.
sentences.cn: 马丁的职责包括清洗汽车。

sentences.en: My mother waxed eloquent on the theme of wifely duty.
sentences.cn: 我母亲大谈为妻之道。

sentences.en: She has a strong sense of moral duty .
sentences.cn: 她的道德责任感很强。

sentences.en: the doorman had &B{gone off duty} and the lobby was unattended.
sentences.cn: 看门人下班了，大厅无人照看。

sentences.en: the duty on cigarettes
sentences.cn: 香烟税

sentences.en: The film explored the tension between public duty and personal affections.
sentences.cn: 这部电影探讨了公共义务和个人情感之间的冲突。

sentences.en: The Night Duty Officer was ready to clock off.
sentences.cn: 值夜班的警员准备打卡下班。

sentences.en: the rusting shack which did duty as the bridge.
sentences.cn: 当桥用的生锈棚屋。

sentences.en: The unions have failed in their duty to female workers.
sentences.cn: 工会未能对女职工尽到责任。

sentences.en: There were 2,250 policemen on duty in and around the stadium.
sentences.cn: 在体育场内及周边有2,250名警察在值勤。

sentences.en: They clocked off duty and left at ten to three.
sentences.cn: 他们打卡下班，于2点50分离开。

sentences.en: They have a case against their directors for breach of fiduciary duty.
sentences.cn: 他们掌握了足够的证据控告董事违犯信托责任。

sentences.en: They neglect their duty at the least hint of fun elsewhere.
sentences.cn: 别处哪怕发生一丁点儿乐事，他们便会忘记自己的职责。

sentences.en: We feel it is our duty to help her.
sentences.cn: 我们感到帮助她是我们的责任。

sentences.en: We must help our brethren, it is our duty.
sentences.cn: 我们必须帮助我们的教友，这是我们的责任。

sentences.en: You are duty bound to help your little sister and brother.
sentences.cn: 你有责任帮助你的弟弟妹妹

sentences.en: You have a duty to your husband and to your children.
sentences.cn: 你对你丈夫和孩子负有责任。

words.tran_cn: 应纳税的；应征税的；（输入品）应课关税的

phrases.tran_cn: 工作周期；占空度；忙闲度
高关税；高性能的；重型的
轻型的；小功率的；温和条件下的；轻负荷
玩忽职守；[法]失职；过失责任
在（或不在）值班（的），在上（或下了）班（的）

trans.tran_en: something that you have to do because it is morally or legally right
